wikipedia_page.main: Frank Nigel Hepper  FLS FIBiol (13 March 1929 – 16 May 2013) was an English botanist, best known for his work as editor of The Flora of West Tropical Africa (vols. II and III).

response: *Frank Nigel Hepper, 84, English botanist.Frank Nigel HEPPER Obituary

link_mentions.page: List of botanists by author abbreviation (H)

response: Aframomum stanfieldii is a species in the ginger family, Zingiberaceae. It was first described by Frank Nigel Hepper.
Aframomum exscapum is a species of plant in the ginger family, Zingiberaceae. It was first described by John Sims and got its current name from Frank Nigel Hepper.
Aframomum strobilaceum is a species of plant in the ginger family, Zingiberaceae. It was first described by Frank Nigel Hepper.
